title._content: [Babe Ruth, Bill Carrigan, Jack Barry, & Vean Gregg, Boston AL (baseball)]  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. [Babe Ruth, Bill Carrigan, Jack Barry, & Vean Gregg, Boston AL (baseball)] [1915] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Original data provided by the Bain News Service on the negatives or caption cards: Barry & Carrigan, Bosox. Vean Gregg previously identified as Del Gainer. Corrected title and date based on research by the Pictorial History Committee, Society for American Baseball Research, 2006. Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.20081 Call Number: LC-B2- 3627-11
